description:
Damp trails mean epic grip, they also mean dodging your fellow rider’s rooster tails. When sunglasses just aren’t offering enough coverage, the Tallcan goggles protect your eyes from trail paté. Antifog treatment, vented frame, and dual layer lens keep the air flowing and your view fog-free. The tall design provides a large field of view, helping you scope the perfect lines.

  • Treated with a military grade anti-fog material. Anti-fog lenses perform best when clean. Simply wash the lenses with water and they’ll keep your vision clear. When not in use, store them in a warm, dry environment
  • Thermal polycarbonate lenses are strong and have great optical clarity
  • Dual layer face foam is comfortable and hypoallergenic
  • Flexible frame fits a variety of face shapes
  • Silicone-ribbed strap stays in place
  • Outriggers make these goggles helmet compatible
name: Ryders Eyewear Tallcan Goggles - Unisex
